DOC.brief_summary: This study multi-site , retrospective chart review determine effect Neevo® Neevo®DHA ( high folate B12 ) versus standard prenatal vitamin hemoglobin ( Hgb ) level pregnant woman throughout course pregnancy . Neevo® prescription medical food indicate dietary management woman doctor 's care face high risk pregnancy , old overactive bladder ( OB ) patient patient unable fully metabolize folic acid . Data collect exist patient chart subject administer Neevo® Neevo®DHA daily compare subject administer prenatal vitamin daily .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Analysis Neevo®/Neevo®DHA Compared Standard Prenatal Vitamin Anemia During Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: Pregnant female , age 2139 , receive either Neevo®/Neevo®DHA another standard prenatal vitamin ( Prenatal vitamin must contain ≤1 mg folic acid , 2735mg iron , ≤12mcg vitamin B12 ) . Clinical diagnosis pregnancy must make ≤12 week pregnancy January 1 , 2008 delivery must occur December 31 , 2009 . Subjects must compliant take Neevo DHA prenatal vitamin . Subjects take Prenate® , Prenate®DHA , Prenate® Elite , Lmethylfolatecontaining prenatal vitamin . The following supplement within 2 month prior randomization ; 100mg vitamin C , B12 injection > 10mg B6 ; > 32mg Iron ; > 1.2mg folate ; L methylfolate product prenatal vitamin Life Extension methylfolate , Prothera methylfolate , Thorne 5MTHF , Metanx® , Neevo® , Neevo®DHA , Deplin® , Cerefolin® , CerefolinNAC® . History anemia iron deficiency anemia leukemia . Blood transfusion 4 month prior diagnosis pregnancy .
